name: ESC - Magritte
description:
Magritte


Named after a famous Belgian surrealist artist René Françoi Ghislain Magritte, Magritte is an EastSide Co theme designed for those types of Shopify Merchants that sell Household products and goods.


Beautifully designed and highly customisable, Magritte is for the masses, whether you're a small merchant that has a few products or you're a merchant that has a large catalogue. Even if you are launching a new brand, this and any of our other themes are great to get you and your business started. We do not just understand great design, but we pride ourselves on best practice user experience and this is what we have done.


So say hello to 'Magritte'.


We've thought about how each Shopify/Shopify Plus merchant within chosen sectors have their product lines and come up with this theme that has been fully designed and tested for all various options. This includes different menu styles, layouts for your images on the product pages including variants and quick-buy options.


Perfect for Fashion Brands, Beauty, Household items, plus many more. We hope you like what you see, please do bear with it though, it might be a slow file to load.


From everyone here at EastSide Co, we very much look forward to working with you.
